name: file-convert
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
Change version of file format.

You may only specify one top-level option.

inputs.name: border_version_convert
inputs.description: write a border file with a different version

type.name: border_version_convert
type.description: write a border file with a different version

inputs.name: opt_surface_surface
inputs.description: must be specified if the input is version 1: use this surface file for structure and number of vertices, ignore borders on other structures

inputs.name: nifti_version_convert
inputs.description: write a nifti file with a different version

type.name: nifti_version_convert
type.description: write a nifti file with a different version

inputs.name: cifti_version_convert
inputs.description: write a cifti file with a different version

type.name: cifti_version_convert
type.description: write a cifti file with a different version
